title: India's bond markets after RBI’s Dec 5 repo rate decision: Five likely scenarios
description: Explore five potential scenarios for India's bond markets following the RBI's December 5 interest rate decision and expected market reactions.
content: Indias stronger-than-expected GDP growth, at a time when retail inflation is at a record low, jolted the bond markets view on where interest rates are headed and set up the prospect of sharp moves wh… [+3005 chars]
